hero.title: Organize Your Day Effectively
hero.description: Plan, track, and accomplish more with our intuitive task management solution. Experience the future of productivity.

smartCalendar.title: Smart Calendar
smartCalendar.description: Seamlessly plan your day with our intelligent calendar integration.
smartCalendar.details: Our Smart Calendar uses AI to learn your productivity patterns and schedule tasks at the times when you're most likely to complete them effectively.

taskManagement.title: Task Management
taskManagement.description: Create, organize, and prioritize tasks with our intuitive interface.
taskManagement.details: Our task management system allows you to break down complex projects into manageable subtasks, set recurring tasks, and use custom tags to categorize your work.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Get smart suggestions and automate your task management.
aiAssistant.details: Our AI assistant analyzes your task patterns and performance data to provide insights into when you are most effective.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Work together effectively with real-time task sharing.
teamCollaboration.details: Our team collaboration features include shared project boards, real-time task status updates, and in-app messaging.

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.description: Boost productivity with shortcuts and quick task creation.
quickActions.details: Quick actions allow you to add tasks from anywhere in the app using customizable keyboard shortcuts and voice commands.

smartNotifications.title: Smart Notifications
smartNotifications.description: Never miss important tasks with intelligent reminders.
smartNotifications.details: Our smart notification system uses machine learning to determine the best time to remind you about tasks, taking into account factors like your location and past behavior.

register.name: Full Name
register.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters long
register.nameInvalid: Name can only contain letters and spaces
register.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long
register.usernameInvalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
register.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
register.passwordRequirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character

featuresPage.subtitle: Plan My Day offers a comprehensive set of tools to boost your productivity and streamline your workflow.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing or using Plan My Day, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not use our service.

section2.title: 2. Use of Service
section2.content: You may use Plan My Day for your personal, non-commercial use only. You must not use Plan My Day for any illegal or unauthorized purpose nor may you, in the use of the Service, violate any laws in your jurisdiction.

section3.title: 3. User Account
section3.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password.

section4.title: 4. Modifications to Service
section4.content: Plan My Day reserves the right at any time to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the Service (or any part thereof) with or without notice. You agree that Plan My Day shall not be liable to you or to any third party for any modification, suspension or discontinuance of the Service.

section1.title: 1. Information Collection
section1.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create or modify your account, request customer support, or communicate with us. This information may include your name, email address, and phone number.

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to develop new ones, and to protect Plan My Day and our users. We also use the information to communicate with you, to personalize the services we offer, and for other purposes related to our business.

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing and Disclosure
section3.content: We do not share personal information with companies, organizations, or individuals outside of Plan My Day except in the following cases: with your consent, for legal reasons, or to protect rights, property or safety.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: Plan My Day takes reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. However, no internet or email transmission is ever fully secure or error-free.
